org.gradle.platform.base

Class BaseLanguageSourceSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradle.platform.base.BaseLanguageSourceSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buildable, BuildableModelElement, Named, LanguageSourceSet

    public class BaseLanguageSourceSet
extends Object
implements LanguageSourceSet
    Base class for custom language sourceset implementations. A custom implementation of LanguageSourceSet must extend this type.
